title: Hyperlink
summary: Hyperlinks connect webpages or data items to one another. In HTML, <a> elements define hyperlinks from a spot on a webpage (like a text string or image) to another spot on some other webpage (or even on the same page).

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
